    • Uses of DataSheet in org.simplity.kernel.data

      Classes in org.simplity.kernel.data that implement DataSheet 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DynamicSheet
      represents a fields collection internally, but implements all methods of a data sheet.
      class  MultiRowsSheet
      a sheet with possibly more than one rows.
      class  SingleRowSheet
      represents a sheet with exactly one row of data.
